import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Input } from '../../components' import { ROUTE_PATHS } from '../../shared/constants/route-paths' import { userAuthFormLiterals } from '../../shared/constants/literals' import { GoogleIcon } from '../../shared/images' const UserAuthForm = ({ type }) => { return (

{type === ROUTE_PATHS.SIGN_IN ? userAuthFormLiterals.WELCOME_BACK['en'] : userAuthFormLiterals.JOIN_US_TODAY['en']}

{ type === ROUTE_PATHS.SIGN_UP && ( ) }

{userAuthFormLiterals.OR['en']}

{userAuthFormLiterals.DONT_HAVE_AN_ACCOUNT['en']} {userAuthFormLiterals.JOIN_US_TODAY['en']}

{ type === ROUTE_PATHS.SIGN_IN ? (

{userAuthFormLiterals.DONT_HAVE_AN_ACCOUNT['en']} {userAuthFormLiterals.JOIN_US_TODAY['en']}

) : (

{userAuthFormLiterals.ALREADY_A_MEMBER['en']} {userAuthFormLiterals.SIGN_IN_HERE['en']}

) }
) } export default UserAuthForm
